mng: to do, to make, to produce, to write, to compose, to act as, to engage in, to hold (a party), to be, to become, to function (in some capacity), to serve as, to be used for, to form (a bond or relationship), to pretend, to feign, to act a part, to put on appearance

exm.mng: way of handling sth, method for making, work method, recipe, practice
to be called, to be known as
to work, to handle matters, to have a job
to be a guest or visitor
to dream, to have a dream, fig. illusion, fantasy, pipe dream
to treat as, to regard as, to look upon as
to work with one's hands, manual work, workmanship
